page.title: 17EDUCATION/WILMSLOW
page.content: {Wilmslow County High opened in Sept. {1984.}It was an amalgamation of three Wilmslow Schools,{Dean Row High, {Thorngrove High,}and{Harefield High. The School has{2030 pupils,129 staff, {12 ancilary staff and the Head {Mr.Greensmith. One of the disadvantages of such a large school is the staff have to move from site to site.Eventually however Thorngrove will become the lower school and Harefield the upper school.The pupils come from {Wilmslow,Alderley,Styal and part of {Handforth. The school uniform is maroon and grey and is worn by all except sixth formers. There is a healthy sixth form.About half take A Level courses,and a large number of these go on to higher education.All follow a general course.
